definition.name: NXlens_apm
definition.doc: Draft class definition for a component of an atom probe instrument which details an eventually available reflectron device whose purpose is to deflect the flight paths of the ions to realize what is effectively an energy compensation.

field.name: has_reflectron
field.doc: Specifier if the instrument has a reflectron (true) or not (false).

field.name: model
field.doc: Given brand or model name by the manufacturer.

field.name: serial_number
field.doc: Given hardware name/serial number or hash identifier issued by the manufacturer.

field.name: description
field.doc: Free-text field to specify further details about the reflectron.

group.doc: Affine transformation(s) which detail where the reflectron is located relative to e.g. the origin of the specimen space reference coordinate system. This group can also be used for specifying how the reflectron is rotated to the specimen axis. The purpose of these more detailed instrument descriptions is to support the creation of a digital twin of the instrument for computational science.
